fetch.command: pkg="msynctool" date="20080204" release="0.36+" # The release should be of the form major.minor-debianversion or major.minor+. # The latter form means that the "svn$date" form of package version should be used majmin=${release%-*} debver=${release#*-} if [ "$debver" = "$release" ] ; then debver="1" ; fi if [ "$majmin" = "${majmin%+}" ] ; then version="$majmin+maemo-$debver" ; else version="${majmin}maemo+svn$date-1" ; fi pkgdir="$pkg-$version" branch="http://svn.opensync.org" svn export -r {${date}T0000Z} $branch/multisync/trunk $pkgdir/source
